version.description: The semantic version of the progress protocol.

oneOf.description: An incremental update to a container image layer download

bytes.description: The number of bytes already fetched.

bytesCached.description: The number of bytes fetched by a previous run.

bytesTotal.description: Total number of bytes. If zero, then this should be considered "unspecified".

description.description: A human readable description of the task if i18n is not available.

id.description:
A human and machine readable unique identifier for the task
(e.g., the image name). For tasks that only happen once,
it can be set to the same value as task.

stepsCached.description: The number of steps fetched by a previous run.

stepsTotal.description: The total number of steps (e.g. container image layers, RPMs)

task.description:
A machine readable type (e.g., pulling) for the task (used for i18n
and UI customization).

oneOf.description: An incremental update with discrete steps

description.description: A human readable description of the task if i18n is not available.

id.description:
A human and machine readable unique identifier for the task
(e.g., the image name). For tasks that only happen once,
it can be set to the same value as task.

stepsCached.description: The number of steps fetched by a previous run.

stepsTotal.description: The total number of steps (e.g. container image layers, RPMs)

task.description:
A machine readable type (e.g., pulling) for the task (used for i18n
and UI customization).

SubTaskBytes.description:
An incremental update to e.g. a container image layer download.
The first time a given "subtask" name is seen, a new progress bar should be created.
If bytes == bytes_total, then the subtask is considered complete.

bytesCached.description: The number of bytes fetched by a previous run (e.g., zstd_chunked).

description.description:
A human readable description of the task if i18n is not available.
(e.g., "OSTree Chunk:", "Derived Layer:")

id.description:
A human and machine readable identifier for the task
(e.g., ostree chunk/layer hash).

subtask.description:
A machine readable type for the task (used for i18n).
(e.g., "ostree_chunk", "ostree_derived")

SubTaskStep.description: Marks the beginning and end of a dictrete step

completed.description: Starts as false when beginning to execute and turns true when completed.
